title: Update On-Screen Graphics During Live Broadcast
description: During a live sports broadcast, the score is incorrect on the on-screen graphic. An agent must correct it immediately.

tasks.description: Receive the correct score from the official source (e.g., the stats keeper).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct, verified score.
Agent successfully connects to the graphics generator.

tasks.description: Update the score field in the graphics template and push the change to air.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the on-screen graphic, and the correct score is now displayed.
